name: Jacqueline Horner
text: Alan is without doubt the best in his field. He captures the children's imagination with a variety of magic, puppets and interaction. If you are looking for that someone special, you will find it in Al. Give him a call, you will not be disappointed.

name: Anna-Marie Kimber
text: Mr Jolly was fantastic - he took control of everything. Absolutely fantastic and would recommend him to anyone!

name: Kenny Shuttleworth
text: I would, without hesitation, recommend Mr Jolly to friends and family. Excellent with children and he even entertained bigger kids (adults).

name: Emma Blair
text: Excellent! He came to my little boys 3rd birthday party and everyone loved him. So much so my nephew came away and said I want him to come to my birthday party!
